title: Quran Interpretation Competency Enhancement Course Based on Integrative Liberation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Arabic literacy (secondary level or higher) and basic Quranic interpretation skills (elementary level)
context.additional_context: Evening/Weekend Operations for Working Learners, Utilizing Digital Collaboration Platforms

learning_goals: Learners can interpret Quranic verses from an inclusive perspective within diverse social contexts
Learners can present an interpretive model excluding violent attitudes in collaborative projects conducted via PBL (Problem-Based Learning)
Learners can write self-reflection reports based on a three-stage (purpose-process-content) evaluation system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
